data.title: Atlanta Startup Exits
data.meta_description: Textverarbeitung, Präsentationen und Tabellen im Web
data.text:
1

This was a successful experiment in crowdsourcing. As of 9/13/13, I'm placing this spreadsheet intoSort Sheet

2

comment-only mode. Add comments or email Stephen Fleming to make additions/changes. Thanks!A -> Z

3

Green boxes turn white when you insert the exit value. Add new rows at the bottom. Sort by year using the pull-down menu at the top of Column G. Don't unfreeze rows. Don't be a jerk.
